T02TD1586E:102b-1: kro dha b'a r'a h'i bdzra yo gi n'i s'a dha nam /
T02TD1586E:102b-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma phag mo khros pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1586E:102b-4: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1586E:102b-5: bde chen dkyil 'khor dbus na nyid //
T02TD1586E:102b-6: rtse mo 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon //
T02TD1586E:102b-7: stong nyid snying rje'i thig le mchog / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dpal bstod /
T02TD1586E:102b-10: sngags pas re zhig shin tu nyams dga'i gnas 'dug la //
T02TD1586E:102b-11: lte dbus 'khor lo padmo dkar rgyas dri med steng //
T02TD1586E:102b-12: bde chen 'byung gnas rab tu dmar ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02TD1586E:102b-13: de steng rgyal ba lha mo'i sa bon hr'i: yig blta //
T02TD1586E:102b-14: me tog spos sogs sna tshogs mchod pa rab 'byams dang //
T02TD1586E:102b-15: thub pa dgos pa skye ba'i don bsgrub chos kyi sgras //
T02TD1586E:102b-16: mkha' khyab byas nas slar 'ong yongs gyur 'bar ba yi //
T02TD1586E:102b-17: ye shes gri gug rdo rjes mtshan pa gsal por gyur //
T02TD1586E:102b-18: de las slar yang 'phags tshogs mchod dang 'gro ba yi //
T02TD1586E:102b-19: don bsgrubs byas byung de nyid yongs gyur lha mo'i sku //
T02TD1586E:102b-20: dmar mo 'jigs khros phag zhal bgrad gdangs 'gying bag brtan //
T02TD1586E:102b-21: gri gug thod 'dzin mi mgo'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1586E:102b-22: de rjes de g-yas grags snyan sngon mo sgegs khros dang //
T02TD1586E:102b-23: g-yon du rnam snang gser mdog gzhon nu ma rangs tshul //
T02TD1586E:102b-24: me long gzugs ltar rtse gcig bsams nas 'od zer gyi //
T02TD1586E:102b-25: lcags kyu rnon pos ye shes sems mar rab gzhug bya //
T02TD1586E:102b-26: dus gsum rgyal bas shin tu byin brlabs dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1586E:102b-27: bde chen ye shes snying rje mchog gi ro myang gzhi //
T02TD1586E:103a-1: mchod pas sngon du mchod la de nyid rjes //
T02TD1586E:103a-2: rdzas dang yid kyis sna tshogs mchod sprin rab 'byams spro //
T02TD1586E:103a-3: mgrin pa lag pa lus kyi gnas rnams byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1586E:103a-4: dag par bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i nga rgyal can //
T02TD1586E:103a-5: dam tshig mchod rdzas chang gi mchod pa dang bcas la//
T02TD1586E:103a-6: de yis mnyes gyur snying gi padmo'i 'dab ma yi //
T02TD1586E:103a-7: sngags phreng gis bskor sems kyi hr'i: yig byi ru'i mdog / snying gi mun sel mkha' la nyi ltar gsal bar blta //
T02TD1586E:103a-8: brtse ba'i rlung bskyod ye shes 'dod zer 'bar bas //
T02TD1586E:103a-9: 'gro rnams kun gyi lus ngag yid kyi sdig bsregs nas //
T02TD1586E:103a-11: / slar 'ong 'od kyis rang nyid snying gi mun pa dang //
T02TD1586E:103a-12: de yi nyer bsngogs dri ma ma lus rnam par bsal //
T02TD1586E:103a-13: mtha' dag sna tshogs rang sems dri med bdag nyid de //
T02TD1586E:103a-14: de bdag bdag nyid mkha' ltar spros bral rnam par dben //
T02TD1586E:103a-15: de nyid 'dir ni bde chen khro mo'i skur bstan pa //
T02TD1586E:103a-16: zab mo'i spyod yul dpa' bo rnams kyis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1586E:103a-17: aom kro dha buddha d'a ki n'i ye h'um phat sv'a ha //
T02TD1586E:103a-18: aom badzra warnna n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1586E:103a-19: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1586E:103a-20: 'bum phrag gcig dang gsum dang bzhi //
T02TD1586E:103a-21: lnga bzlas ma yengs yid can gyis //
T02TD1586E:103a-22: bgegs skrod grong khyer bsdu ba dang //
T02TD1586E:103a-23: grong rdal 'jig dang don kun sgrub //
T02TD1586E:103a-24: dpal ldan mkha' 'gro lha gsum gyi //
T02TD1586E:103a-25: rnal 'byor zab mo bla ma'i bka' //
T02TD1586E:103a-26: legs rnyed sngags grub bsngags pa'i phyir //
T02TD1586E:103a-27: dpal 'dzin gyis byas mchog grub rgyu //
T02TD1586E:103a-28: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma phag mo khros pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1586E:103a-29: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1586E:103a-31: // / kha che'i pandi ta chen po buddha shr'i bha dra dang /
T02TD1586E:103a-32: bod kyi lo chung gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
T02TD1586E:103a-34: // / aom kro dha buddha d'a ki n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1586E:103a-35: aom badzra warnna n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1586E:103a-36: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1586E:103a-37: 'bum phrag gcig gis bgegs rnams skrod ;
T02TD1586E:103a-38: / gsum gyis grong khyer sdud par byed //
T02TD1586E:103a-39: bzhi yis grong rdal 'jig pa dang //
T02TD1586E:103a-40: lnga yis don kun sgrub par byed //
T02TD1586E:103a-41: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma phag mo khros ma'i gsang sngags kyi rim pa'o /
T02TD1586E:103a-43: // / stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1586E:103a-44: khams gsum pa yi ngo bo nyid //
